title: Reproducible order of enties in `app/<project-name>.jar`
body:
### Description

A Quarkus build (re)builds the application's jar into the `app/` folder, but the order of the entries may vary.

While verifying a release-candidate of Apache Polaris today, I noticed that the checksums of a locally build an the staged version of the jar in the `app/` folder are different. While the "net content" is equal (`zipcmp` reports no differences), `zipinfo` reports a different order of the jar entries in the locally built jar and the staged jar.

The difference in this case is when `application.properties` appears.

Locally built jar:
```
$ zipinfo local/polaris-bin-1.2.0-incubating/admin/app/polaris-admin-1.2.0-incubating.jar 
Archive:  local/polaris-bin-1.2.0-incubating/admin/app/polaris-admin-1.2.0-incubating.jar
Zip file size: 27739 bytes, number of entries: 29
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/config/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/maven/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/maven/org.apache.polaris/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/maven/org.apache.polaris/polaris-admin/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 gradle/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 gradle/jar-licenses/
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1066 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BaseCommand.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1311 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand$InputOptions$RootCredentialsOptions.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1327 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand$InputOptions$StandardInputOptions.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx      936 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand$InputOptions$FileInputOptions.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx      955 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand$InputOptions$SchemaInputOptions.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1453 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand$InputOptions.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     8444 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1888 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/PolarisAdminTool.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     4402 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/PurgeCommand.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1469 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/config/AdminToolProducers$1.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx      816 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/config/AdminToolProducers$2.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     2817 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/config/AdminToolProducers.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     2884 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 application.properties
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx    11358 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/LICENSE
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx      305 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/NOTICE
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     8702 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/maven/org.apache.polaris/polaris-admin/pom.xml
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx      117 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/maven/org.apache.polaris/polaris-admin/pom.properties
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     4182 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/jandex.idx
29 files, 54432 bytes uncompressed, 20271 bytes compressed:  62.8%
```

Staged jar:
```
$ zipinfo rc1/polaris-bin-1.2.0-incubating/admin/app/polaris-admin-1.2.0-incubating.jar
Archive:  rc1/polaris-bin-1.2.0-incubating/admin/app/polaris-admin-1.2.0-incubating.jar
Zip file size: 27739 bytes, number of entries: 29
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/config/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/maven/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/maven/org.apache.polaris/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/maven/org.apache.polaris/polaris-admin/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 gradle/
drwxr-xr-x  2.0 unx        0 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 gradle/jar-licenses/
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1327 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand$InputOptions$StandardInputOptions.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     2817 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/config/AdminToolProducers.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1469 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/config/AdminToolProducers$1.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx      816 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/config/AdminToolProducers$2.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1311 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand$InputOptions$RootCredentialsOptions.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1453 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand$InputOptions.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     8444 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx      955 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand$InputOptions$SchemaInputOptions.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1888 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/PolarisAdminTool.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx      936 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BootstrapCommand$InputOptions$FileInputOptions.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     1066 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/BaseCommand.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     4402 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 org/apache/polaris/admintool/PurgeCommand.class
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx    11358 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/LICENSE
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     8702 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/maven/org.apache.polaris/polaris-admin/pom.xml
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx      117 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/maven/org.apache.polaris/polaris-admin/pom.properties
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx      305 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/NOTICE
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     4182 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 META-INF/jandex.idx
-rw-r--r--  2.0 unx     2884 bx defN 70-Jan-02 01:00 application.properties
29 files, 54432 bytes uncompressed, 20271 bytes compressed:  62.8%
```


/cc @gsmet 

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
